code_info: No expiration date is printed on product, however, at the store level, retailer will apply an expiration sticker onto each cake square.  Lot coding is a 5 digit number, SYDDD, where S designates the shift (1,2, or 3), Y designates the year, and DDD designates the Julian day.  Example  19038 where 1 = shift, 9 = year, 038 = Julian day      Lot codes: 19037 29037 39037
